note.p: Magistrate and dog-breeder. Of Dursley, Gloucestershire. Buried in Sydney, Australia.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2594/9/10)
Correspondence vol. 22, letter from George Cupples, 21 February 1874, enclosure 4
Sydney, Australia, cemetery headstone transcriptions, 1837–2003 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 November 2017)
